dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.0: Your Pokémon aren't quite ready for this battle. They need to level up significantly.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.1: Before you challenge me, make sure your Pokémon are ready to reach new heights.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.10: Your team could use a little more experience. The journey is just beginning.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.11: Your Pokémon are still finding their power. Advancing could open new possibilities.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.12: Your team seems to be at the beginning of their journey. Consider expanding your horizons.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.13: Your Pokémon are still on the rise. Advancing could help them gain more strength.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.14: Your team feels a bit underdeveloped. Consider seeking out new challengers to raise the cap.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.15: Your Pokémon need to level up before facing me. Progressing could help them reach new limits.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.2: Your team feels a bit inexperienced. Consider some extra training to prepare.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.3: Your Pokémon could benefit from a little more adventure. Progressing could help them grow.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.4: Your team seems to be lacking in power. A new level cap could be unlocked with more progress.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.5: Your Pokémon are still on their journey. There's more to achieve as you advance.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.6: You might want to take a detour. Exploring further could raise your level cap.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.7: Your team feels a bit untested. Perhaps a new challenge will help them grow.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.8: It looks like your Pokémon are still growing. Keep exploring to unlock their full potential.
dialogs.rctmod.default.low_level_cap.9: Your Pokémon are still in training. Advancing in the series could help them reach new levels.
dialogs.rctmod.default.missing_pokemon.0: You do not seem to have any Pokémon capable of fighting in your team.
dialogs.rctmod.default.missing_pokemon.1: Looks like your Pokémon need a break!
You can't battle without a healthy team!
Make sure your Pokémon are ready to fight!
Come back with a strong team.
dialogs.rctmod.default.missing_pokemon.2: Your team isn't ready for battle.
dialogs.rctmod.default.missing_pokemon.3: Come back when your Pokémon have rested.
dialogs.rctmod.default.missing_pokemon.4: Your Pokémon look too tired to fight!
dialogs.rctmod.default.missing_pokemon.5: Heal up your team before we battle!
dialogs.rctmod.default.missing_pokemon.6: It seems your Pokémon are out of commission.
dialogs.rctmod.default.missing_pokemon.7: You need a fighting-fit team to challenge me.
dialogs.rctmod.default.missing_pokemon.9: Your Pokémon aren't in fighting condition.
dialogs.rctmod.default.missing_required_: It looks like you have another trainer to defeat before you can challenge me.
You need to take care of a different trainer first before we can battle.
You seem a bit preoccupied; let's postpone our battle for now.
I can't battle you right now; it seems you have some unfinished business.
You might want to take care of something before we battle.
It looks like you have a challenge ahead of you; let's wait.
You should focus on your current challenge before we can battle.
Once you handle your current challenge, I'll be ready for our battle!
There's someone else you have to face before you can challenge me.
I can't battle you yet; you have another trainer to deal with first.
You seem to have a challenge ahead of you; finish that trainer first.
I see you have some unfinished business with another trainer; let's wait.
You need to handle that other trainer before we can have our match.
I wouldn't want to battle you until you've taken care of that trainer.
You have to defeat another trainer before you can take me on.
I think you should focus on that trainer before challenging me.
Only those who have triumphed over a champion can stand here.
You must defeat a champion to earn your chance.
A true test of strength lies ahead.
Conquer a champion to prove your strength.
Face a champion before you can face me.
Only champions can stand before me.
Your path leads through a champion first.
Prepare yourself; a champion awaits your challenge.
A champion stands between you and your goal.
Prove yourself against a champion first.
Your journey has more steps ahead.
Only those who best a champion can challenge me.
Return when you've tested your skills against a champion.

Your skills need further refinement.
Beat the Elite 4 first, then come talk to me again.
Defeat the Elite 4 members before challenging me.

Only champions can face me, and you're not there yet.

The Elite 4 stand between you and me.
Your journey is not yet complete.
You're not ready to face me yet.
Challenge the Elite 4 before attempting this.
You need to earn more badges before you can challenge me.
Your badge collection isn't impressive enough for this battle.
You must gather more badges to advance to this level.
Your badge level is inadequate for this showdown; aim higher!
You need to conquer more gyms to earn the badges required here.
Your badge tally is too low for this encounter; keep training!
Increase your badge count to prove your worth against me.
You should aim for more badges before attempting to challenge me again.
I'm afraid your badge count is too low to face me.

Your current badge total doesn't meet the requirements for this match.
You lack the necessary badges to take on this challenge.
A few more badges would certainly help your chances.
You need to prove yourself against other gym leaders first.
Your badge count is insufficient for this duel; seek out more leaders.
Challenge other trainers to boost your badge collection.

dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.0: It seems your Pokémon are a bit too strong for your current level cap. You might want to store them until you’ve proven yourself against tougher trainers!
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.1: Your team looks powerful, but they might not respect you yet. Consider challenging gym leaders and rivals to earn your right to use higher-level Pokémon!
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.10: Building trust with your Pokémon takes time and victories. Consider challenging gym leaders and rivals to enhance your connection!
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.11: Your Pokémon seem hesitant to follow your lead. Gaining more badges and proving yourself against various trainers could boost their confidence!
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.12: You need to progress further in the series to lead those powerful Pokémon. Storing them until you’ve proven yourself might be the best option.
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.13: Consider storing high-level Pokémon until you're ready.
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.14: You may not be ready to handle such high-level Pokémon. It's best to store them for now.
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.15: It seems your Pokémon are a bit too strong for you right now. Consider storing some until you earn more badges.
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.2: Some of your Pokémon don’t seem to fully trust you. Earning more badges by defeating various trainers could help you gain their respect.
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.3: You may not be ready to handle such high-level Pokémon just yet. Storing them in the PC until you progress further might be wise.
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.4: Some of your Pokémon appear to be questioning your leadership. Store them in the PC might be the best option for now.
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.5: It looks like your Pokémon aren't quite listening to you. Proving your skills against rivals and evil team members could change that!
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.6: Your current badge count might not impress your Pokémon. Progress through the series to strengthen your bond and unlock the ability to use higher-level Pokémon!
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.7: Your team seems to question your authority. Show them you’re worthy by collecting more badges and defeating various trainers!
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.8: High-level Pokémon require a skilled trainer. You might want to store some until you’ve faced more challenges and earned your right to use them!
dialogs.rctmod.default.over_level_cap.9: Maybe you should store some of your Pokémon that do not respect you yet, it seems dangerous to fight with them.
dialogs.rctmod.default.player_busy.0: Focus on your current match first!
dialogs.rctmod.default.player_busy.1: You're almost there, keep it up!
dialogs.rctmod.default.player_busy.10: Take your time, I'm not going anywhere.
dialogs.rctmod.default.player_busy.11: Finish that battle, then we can clash!
dialogs.rctmod.default.player_busy.12: I'm excited to see how you finish!
dialogs.rctmod.default.player_busy.14: You're doing great, give it your all!
dialogs.rctmod.default.player_busy.3: I believe in you, finish that match!
dialogs.rctmod.default.player_busy.4: One battle at a time, champ!
dialogs.rctmod.default.player_busy.5: Wrap up that fight before challenging me!
dialogs.rctmod.default.player_busy.7: Keep your head in the game!
dialogs.rctmod.default.player_busy.8: Don't split your focus, finish strong!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.0: Sorry, I'm tied up in a battle right now!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.1: I need to finish this battle first!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.10: I'll battle you after this one!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.12: I'm currently in a heated match!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.13: Let me finish this battle first!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.14: I'm busy right now; another battle awaits!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.15: I'll take on your challenge next!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.3: Hold on, I'm already battling someone!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.5: I'm in the middle of an epic battle!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.6: Please wait, I'm battling right now!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.8: I can't accept a challenge at the moment!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_busy.9: I'm locked in combat right now!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.0: You got me good this time.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.13: I learned a lot from this battle.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.14: You're on a whole different level!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.16: You really caught me off guard.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.18: I need to rethink my tactics.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.22: I'll be ready for a rematch!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.23: You've taught me a valuable lesson.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.31: I'll need to train much more.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.32: You've got the upper hand today.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.35: I need to get better strategies.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.38: I need a new game plan.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.39: You really know how to battle!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.42: I have a lot to learn from you.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.44: I'm out of tricks this time.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.45: You've bested me fair and square.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.46: I'll be more prepared next time!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.47: You read me like a book!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.48: I need to train with you sometime!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.51: I'll train harder for our next battle.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.53: I need to step up my game.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.54: You've shown me the gaps in my team.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.55: I'm no match for you right now.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.58: I'll take this as a learning experience.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.60: I need to rethink my team composition.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.61: Your battle style is unique and effective!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.62: I'll be training while you celebrate!
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_lost.63: I'm humbled by your victory today.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.1: I hope you have learned from this lesson.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.12: This is just another trophy for me.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.13: Challenge me again once you've trained more.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.15: You fought well, but not well enough.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.16: Practice makes perfect, keep at it.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.18: You'll need more experience to beat me.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.19: A good battle, but not good enough.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.2: You still have got a lot to learn.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.20: I'll always be ready for your next attempt.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.21: You put up a good fight, but I came out on top.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.25: This was a good warm-up for me.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.26: Today's not your day, try again.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.27: I'm always up for a challenge, but not today.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.29: You've got spirit, but I've got skill.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.30: You did well, just not well enough.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.31: You'll need more than that to defeat me.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.32: Better luck in your next battle.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.35: You were close, but not close enough.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.36: A win's a win, and today it's mine.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.37: I'm taking this win with pride.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.38: You're not quite ready to defeat me.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.39: Your effort was valiant, but I remain undefeated.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.41: Keep trying, you'll catch up one day.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.42: You'll have to train harder to beat me.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.43: This battle was mine from the start.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.44: I'm walking away with the win today.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.45: You gave it your best, but it wasn't enough.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.48: I respect your effort, but victory is mine.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.49: I've honed my skills for moments like this.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.50: Your challenge ends in my victory.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.52: You've got the spirit, but I've got the edge.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.55: I came, I saw, I conquered.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.57: Your skills are growing, keep it up.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.58: The victory is mine, but you'll get there.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.6: You've got potential, but not today.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.60: You'll need to bring more to the table.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.63: I'll be ready for your challenge next time.
dialogs.rctmod.default.trainer_won.9: This win is mine to keep.
dialogs.rctmod.default.unknown_reason: Failed to start the battle for an unknown reason (contact server admin/developer).
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.0: Hey there! It looks like you haven't started the right series yet. Get going, and then we can battle!
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.1: I admire your enthusiasm, but you need to begin the correct series before you can challenge me.
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.10: I see you're ready to battle, but you haven't started the required challenges yet. Get going!
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.11: You're on the wrong track! Start the necessary series, and then we can have our showdown.
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.12: I can't accept your challenge right now. You need to begin the earlier battles first!
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.13: You're not ready for this challenge yet! Make sure to start the correct series before stepping up.
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.14: You're not in the right series for this battle! Focus on starting the correct challenges, and then we can fight.
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.15: I love your enthusiasm, but you need to embark on the right series before we can battle!
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.2: Not quite ready for me! Make sure to start the right series first if you want to face me.
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.3: Whoa! You're not on the right path for this challenge. Begin the correct series before stepping up to me!
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.4: I can't battle you just yet. You need to start the right series to earn your chance to fight me!
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.5: You're eager, I like that! But you must begin the necessary challenges before you can take me on.
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.6: Hold on! You haven't started the required series. Make sure you're ready for this fight!
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.7: I appreciate your spirit, but you need to embark on the right journey first. Then we can battle!
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.8: You're not quite there! Make sure to start the necessary series before challenging me.
dialogs.rctmod.default.wrong_series.9: Nice effort, but you need to begin the correct series to battle me. Keep training hard!
gui.rctmod.trainer_association.series_re: Starting a new series will reset your current series progression! In return completing a series will permanently increase your luck for better loot from trainers.
gui.rctmod.trainer_card.title: Trainer Card
series.rctmod.bdsp.description: A casual series but still with decent difficulty. Are you ready to conquer Sinnoh?
series.rctmod.bdsp.title: Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl
series.rctmod.empty.title: Empty
series.rctmod.radicalred.description: A difficult series taking place in the Kanto region. Are you up to the challenge?
series.rctmod.radicalred.title: Radical Red
series.rctmod.unbound.description: A dispute between two mysterious organizations is causing trouble in the Borrious region. Who knows what destiny has in store for you.
series.rctmod.unbound.title: Unbound
